title: Basboosa
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) semolina', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '250g (8 oz) low fat natural yoghurt', '120ml (4 fl oz) vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons desiccated coconut', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '350ml (12 fl oz) water', '350g (12 oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons rose water', '6 whole almonds, split in half']
